definition[0]: to send someone back to their own country
example[0]: After the war, prisoners were repatriated.
definition[1]: to send profits or money you have earned back to your own country
definition[2]: to send money, profits etc back to your own country
example[1]: Capital gains on investments may be repatriated only once a year.
example[2]: Japanese companies continue torepatriate some overseasassets.
